author: rudolf6
content:
Threw together a quick doc to summarize the migration strategy that was suggested by <@807285075736789062> on the last Verkle Implementers Call.

Would love any thoughts/feedback/corrections. Goal is to keep moving the discussion along, and hopefully reach stronger alignment on the best path forward üôè

Thanks to <@353136597522448385> and <@774033563732541451> for helping put this together quickly.
